title: The Detox Cookbook: Cleansing for Food Lovers
features: Whether looking for a regular detox regime or just getting back on track after a period of indulgence, the health-conscious will gain energy, lose weight, cleanse their livers, and feel fantastic with the help of this collection of mouth-watering recipes. Brilliant color photography illustrates these fresh, healthy meals.
